 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִלּוּ‎</span> **conjunction** (often in Mishnah; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִילּוּ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִין‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhLAAiAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAsACIAAAKNjI+py+0PE5ixUjYzqDA3vXGP9pFiGWLeiTomq6wLCH/1raa4i1DX+Sv1DqmgS6fqbX5G4QgpCzSTzw7SWT1arjMrhxuD6qZUrVLyHV+bQfCsGDWsx2niS2ps1+Wgvi/KxQbnx0dzJjGHCLa0dzi0Y4cYZmFFKHlEpniH5xbZqZS3CRlmOIqZaZqqqloAADs=">, and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּ‎</span>) ==if, though==, only in late Hebrew, [[Eccl.6.6|Eccl 6:6]]; [[Esth.7.4|Esth 7:4]].
